pullrequest.title: Logging Part 1: Misc changes to ignition transport

content.raw:
Looks like `IsValidNamespace` should return true if `_partition` is empty, so seems like we can remove it.

On the other hand, checking if its empty first would shortcut the tests that get performed inside of `IsValidNamespace`, so it might be a micro-optimization. I suppose would could achieve that same micro-optimization by starting off `IsValidNamespace` by checking if the string is empty.
content.html:
Looks like IsValidNamespace should return true if _partition is empty, so seems like we can remove it.

On the other hand, checking if its empty first would shortcut the tests that get performed inside of IsValidNamespace, so it might be a micro-optimization. I suppose would could achieve that same micro-optimization by starting off IsValidNamespace by checking if the string is empty.
